name: GroupManagementTool
tagline: Selfservice portal for group management in Active Directory
body:
### Welcome to Group Management Tool
This free self service portal provides your users in Active Directory an easy way to manage 'their' groups.

![main-page](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11002556/7445281/cab16c10-f1de-11e4-8fa4-157ce3556fe7.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
